ARABIC: أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ يُسَٰرِعُونَ فِى ٱلْخَيْرَٰتِ وَهُمْ لَهَا سَٰبِقُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: such people are truly racing towards good things, and they are the first to reach them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Are the ones who hasten to goodness and outpace the others.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: it is these who hasten to do good works and vie in so doing with one another.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: to God, these are the ones who really compete with each other in virtuous deeds and are the foremost ones in the task.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: These people hasten to perform goodness, and it is they who shall reach it first.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: It is these who hasten in the good deeds, and they are foremost in them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: These hasten to good things and they are foremost in (attaining) them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: those vie in good works, outracing to them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: These race for the good things, and they shall win them in the race.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: it is they who vie with one another in doing good works and shall be the foremost in doing so.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: These are hastening on to good, and they are therein foremost.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: —it is they who are zealous in [performing] good works and take the lead in them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: It is these who hasten in every good work, and these who are foremost in them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: It is these who race for the good deeds, and they are foremost in them [e.g. offering the compulsory Salat (prayers) in their (early) stated, fixed times and so on].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: those, hasten in good works, outracing to them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: It is they who race towards goodness. It is they who will reach it first.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: It is those who hasten to good deeds, and they outstrip [others] therein.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [23:61] those [are the ones who] hasten to [perform] good works, and they [are the ones who] shall come out ahead in them, according to God’s knowledge.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (These) who have such traits (race for the good things) hasten to perform righteous works, (and they shall win them in the race. 379
